email_chain.subject: Freight Quote: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

I hope this email finds you well.

We are pleased to offer a freight quote for the shipment of 12,000 MT of Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Houston under CIF terms. Our initial freight quote is USD 78 per metric ton.

The vessel we propose is the OCEAN BREEZE, which has a DWT of 85,000 and LOA of 250m. The laycan is 20-25 October 2023. Please let us know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Emily Wilson
Maritime Traders

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the quote. USD 78 per MT seems a bit high for our current budget. Could you review the rate and possibly offer a discount? Also, could you provide the demurrage rate per day?

Best regards,
Michael Nguyen
Cargo Transport

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Thank you for your prompt response. Considering your feedback, we can offer a revised rate of USD 75 per metric ton. The demurrage rate will be USD 12,000 per day.

Please confirm if this meets your requirements and if you need any further details on the laycan or loading window.

Best regards,
Emily Wilson
Maritime Traders

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the revised quote. The rate of USD 75 per metric ton is more in line with our expectations. However, we need to ensure that the demurrage rate is reasonable. Could you confirm the laytime start and end dates?

Best regards,
Michael Nguyen
Cargo Transport

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

The laytime will start on 2023-10-20 and end on 2023-10-25. We can offer a laytime of 5 days with the demurrage rate of USD 12,000 per day thereafter.

Please confirm if these terms are acceptable.

Best regards,
Emily Wilson
Maritime Traders

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

We are satisfied with the terms and the laytime period. Please proceed with the necessary arrangements.

Best regards,
Michael Nguyen
Cargo Transport

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Thank you for your confirmation. We will proceed with the arrangements and keep you updated on the progress.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Emily Wilson
Maritime Traders
